entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Server-Side sorta-kinda-breaks EF Core used in AuthorizationRequirementHandlers #40257
  • JwtSecurityTokenHandler will always create IsAuthorized = true for whatever claims we pass #40256
  • Enable packages for Mariner 2.0 #40253
  • Enable build of Linux Arm64 RPM packages #40252
  • Upgrading Blazor project requires downloading dotnet hosting 6 for IIS Express too #40251
  • Run `startvscode.sh` returns a syntax error #40250
  • Blazor WASM caching persists even with 'no-cache' header (nginx) #40249
  • Virtualize component's Items property should be IReadOnlyCollection #40247
  • Blazor UI Events not firing in SPA in Site Path #40246
  • Cannot load blazor in an angular app #40245
    6.0.x
  • Could we have Async validation in Blazor? #40244
  • Blazor Server - Ambiguous Routes when changing Base Path #40243
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.TestHost.TestServer - Client hangs when writing large data synchronously #40241
  • SignInManager.GetTwoFactorAuthenticationUserAsync() returns null if called after a long wait after calling PasswordSignInAsync() #40240
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, multiple_queries #40239
  • Add an EventSource event when the server is listening for incoming requests #40238
  • OutputCaching Middleware #40232
    7.0.0
  • Output-caching should support byte-range caching #40231
    7.0-preview6
  • Output-caching should support response substitution #40230
    7.0-preview5
  • Output-caching has multiple data storage options #40229
    7.0-preview3
  • Output-caching entries can be purged programmatically #40228
    7.0-preview4
  • Output-caching should support tagged entries #40227
    7.0-preview3
  • Output-caching should support ETags #40226
    7.0-preview5
  • Output-caching can return stale results #40225
    7.0-preview4
  • Output-caching can lock concurrent requests #40224
    7.0-preview4
  • Output-caching entries can vary by custom values #40223
    7.0-preview3
  • Output-caching imperative configuration #40222
    7.0-preview3
  • Output-caching declarative configuration #40221
    7.0-preview4

Closed

  • Blazor & Custom Certificates #40144
  • CSS Hot Reload Causing Browser Link Error in JS Console in Browser #40189
  • Perf regression: json_netty #40193
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_nodejs, json_actix #40192
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, updates #40102
  • Allow customizing the cookie consent value #40164
    7.0-preview2
  • Compiler crashing issues reported through internal telemetry #38879
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Multiple @page on razor pages #40132
  • Documentation on the steps to create a blazor webasm or server app from scratch #40236
  • Subscribe to Blazor Web Assembly AuthenticationStateChange Event #40163
  • Quarantine <FAILING_TEST_NAME> #40237
  • Kestrel memory pool does not reliably decrease with load #24958
    .NET 7 Planning
  • LogLevel Warning is somewhat verbose for UserManager #40160
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add gRPC JSON transcoding #40242
    area-grpc
  • return value for single HttpContext parameter #40235
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Input components two way binding #40234
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • New TryParseModelBinder #40233
    area-mvc
  • [release/3.1] Resolve Component Governance bugs #40220
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.24
  • [release/5.0] Resolve Component Governance bugs #40218
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.16

Merged

  • Update SharedFramework.md #40254
    7.0-preview2
  • Add nullability to Identity / Identity.UI #40167
    area-identity, 7.0-preview2
  • Do less copying / zipping for Helix #40134
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview2
  • Change log level from warning to debug in SignInManager #40179
    area-identity, community-contribution, 7.0-preview2
  • Update SDK #40219
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview2
  • Allow custom cookie consent value #40213
    area-security, community-contribution, 7.0-preview2
  • Change log level from warning to debug in UserManager #40178
    area-identity, community-contribution, 7.0-preview2

Updated

  • Support OpenAPI summaries and descriptions on minimal endpoints #40088
    area-web-frameworks
  • Set WebApplication.New().ServerFeatures #40183
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update Microsoft.Data.SqlClient version #40214
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Resolve Component Governance bugs #40217
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.4
  • Re-enable SingleFileExe #39977
    area-mvc
  • Use libnethost to find hostfxr #39810
    area-runtime
  • Add analyzer to detect async void usage #40165
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • RenderTreeDiffBuilder – components after components with @key are oft… #40142
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Use PackageConflictPreferredPackages for analyzers from transport package #40216
    area-infrastructure
  • Add format analyzer for `BindAsync` and `TryParse` custom bindings #37002
    area-infrastructure, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
